div.p: The authors would like to thank the Board of Disaster Management of Karanganyar Regency for their help.

sec.p: The authors declare that they have no financial or personal relationships that may have inappropriately influenced them in writing this article.
S.S. has shared the idea and methodology and reviewed the article. A.R. has conducted the data analysis and coordinated the field survey.
This research has been funded by the Higher Education (Dikti) Grant, Ministry of Research and Higher Education of Indonesia.
Data sharing is not applicable to this article as no new data were created or analysed in this study.
The views and opinions expressed in this article are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any affiliated agency of the authors.
